results.name: TT Isle of Man - Ride on the Edge

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 3000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: The game uses OpenGL, it supports version 1.1+, it will run on just about any graphics card produced in 2004 and later. However AI takes processing power so for all times smooth gameplay recommends are on right.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse or Steam Controller
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows 7/8/10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600 series or higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse or Steam Controller
